features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride two-layer fabric [10,000mm/10,000g] is highly breathable, waterproof, and quick drying; Critically-taped seams lock out the elements
Living Lining® provides consistent temperature regulation without adding bulk or weight
Low-bulk Thermolite® [80g] insulation uses 40% recycled material to trap warm air and features a larger surface area to boost moisture evaporation; Stretch wrist gaiters
Attached Contour hood is helmet compatible and features front and rear adjustment; Sherpa fleece interior hood trim
Jacket-to-pant interface loops; Adjustable cuffs; Side-entry zippers; Mesh-lined, no-snag Pit Zip vents

Card pocket inside hand-warmer pocket, interior mesh dump pockets, zippered kangaroo pocket and zippered media/goggles pocket with therma-pockets inside to keep your device warm, and zippered sleeve pass pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Dry-Ride 2-Layer Polyester Sateen Weave Fabric Blocked with Dry-Ride 2-Layer Polyester/Nylon Blend Twill Fabric
Taffeta Mapped with Printed Taffeta and Living Lining
